ygData.subject: RE: Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I m ALMOST positive that you don t need to target your corpse for the /corpse command to work.  You only need to target if it is not your corpse that
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I'm ALMOST positive that you don't need to target your corpse for
the /corpse command to work. You only need to target if it is not your
corpse that you want to drag.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 10:01 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Handicap of Sorts
>
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Hehe - been that long since you died last you have forgotten how /corpse
> works? You need to target the corpse then /corpse to drag it -
> Lysia's Loc
> will target it for you if you can't see it (in lava, in wall, etc.)
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. Hey! I actually camped last knight!!! (Instead of merely falling
> asleep zoning.. and dieing to some zone train - ugh what a way to
> start your
> day!)
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 3:19 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Handicap of Sorts
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> Unless I'm remembering wrong and the /corpse command targets
> the corpse for you...
>
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
